name: Kewaunee Scientific Corporation
description: Kewaunee Scientific Corporation is a leading manufacturer and provider of laboratory and technical furniture, as well as equipment for laboratory environments. Founded in 1906 and headquartered in Statesville, North Carolina, the company specializes in designing and producing high-quality laboratory workstations, fume hoods, and casework solutions for various industries, including education, healthcare, and research. Kewaunee's products are known for their durability, functionality, and ability to meet the rigorous demands of laboratory settings. The company emphasizes innovation and has invested substantially in research and development to enhance its product offerings, ensuring they incorporate the latest technology and materials. Kewaunee also provides a range of services, including installation and after-sales support, to ensure customer satisfaction. With a commitment to quality and customer service, Kewaunee Scientific aims to be the preferred partner for organizations seeking reliable and efficient laboratory solutions. Their mission includes not only providing superior products but also contributing to the advancement of scientific research and education through their collaborations and partnerships.
ceo: David R. J. D. M. W. H. R. B. W. D. D. H. P. M. C. M. K. M.

seo.meta_title: Kewaunee Scientific Corporation | Laboratory Furniture and Equipment
seo.meta_description: Explore Kewaunee Scientific Corporation, a leader in laboratory furniture and equipment solutions. Discover innovative products designed for various laboratory environments.

faq.question: What does Kewaunee Scientific Corporation specialize in?
faq.answer: Kewaunee Scientific specializes in manufacturing laboratory furniture and equipment.

faq.question: Where is Kewaunee Scientific headquartered?
faq.answer: Kewaunee Scientific is headquartered in Statesville, North Carolina, USA.

faq.question: What types of products does Kewaunee offer?
faq.answer: Kewaunee offers laboratory workstations, fume hoods, casework solutions, and various laboratory equipment.
